statement.name: INSERT_SMACHK
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMACHK (NROCHK, NROQNT, FCHCHK, BGNCHK, ENDCHK, ULTCHK, STDCHK, SQLBKR) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMACHK
statement.sql: UPDATE SMACHK SET NROQNT=?, FCHCHK=?, BGNCHK=?, ENDCHK=?, ULTCHK=?, STDCHK=?, SQLBKR=? WHERE NROCHK=?
